name = "Blueprint example: fsnodes"

[customizations]

  [[customizations.directories]]
    path = "/var/tmp/dir"
    user = "lzap"
    group = "lzap"
    mode = "750"
    ensure_parents = true

  [[customizations.files]]
    path = "/var/tmp/file1"

  [[customizations.files]]
    path = "/var/tmp/dir/file1"
    mode = "640"
    data = "---"

  [[customizations.files]]
    path = "/var/tmp/dir/file2"
    data = "test"
